body:
Hi

I wanna know how to define the thermal and lighting load profiles by using the EnergyPlus function “Zone- HVAC:IdealLoadsAirSystem” in HB?

Thanks a lot

Masoome

replies.body:
Hi Masoome,

You need to use the HB_setEPZoneLoads component for that. There you can define all load types that you want to take into consideration in the simulation. Probably you need also the HB_setEPZoneSchedules component.

-A.
